main event: A bright, shiny white object was seen flying fast and straight, then disappeared into the distance in Troy, Ohio on January 3, 1961.
interesting points: The object was observed for 2-3 minutes.
The object was described as a bright, shiny white object flying fast and straight.
The object disappeared into the distance.
The witness was a practical engineer with a mechanical and scientific background.
The witness had previously seen similar objects on two other occasions, one in August and one around Christmas time.
witnesses: at least one witness, a practical engineer
